task: Accept a new ride request.
Decline a new ride request.
Start navigation to the pickup location.
Notify passenger upon arrival at the pickup location.
Start the ride after picking up the passenger.
End the ride upon arrival at the destination.
Rate the passenger.
Retrieve estimated earnings for the day or week.
View the ride history for the day.
Send a message or call the passenger through the app.
Update driver profile details, such as photo or vehicle information.
Switch to or from 'Delivery Mode' for Uber Eats.
Withdraw earnings to a linked bank account.
Review and dispute fare adjustments.
Enable or disable notifications for new ride requests.
Report an issue or incident related to a ride.
Review driver ratings and feedback received.
Check the status of a background check or document verification.
Schedule or modify a vehicle inspection appointment.
Enable or disable receiving ride requests in specific categories (e.g., UberXL, UberPool).
